title: Romantic and Thoughtful Texts to Send to Your Boyfriend to Make Him Feel Special

steps.title: "I’m so thankful for everything you’ve given me.
steps.content: "I’m so thankful for everything you’ve given me. Your kindness, your creativity, your love—I wouldn’t trade these things for anything.”

steps.title: “I want to spend the rest of my life by your side.
steps.content: “I want to spend the rest of my life by your side. I dream of us as grandparents, sitting on the front porch in rocking chairs, and we’re still crazy in love. Babe, I’m in this relationship for the long haul. For better or for worse, ‘til death do us part, come what may.”

steps.title: “You’re my soulmate, the one I've been looking for my whole life.
steps.content: “You’re my soulmate, the one I've been looking for my whole life. My stomach does flip-flops when I look at you across the room and realize— you’re my person . The love I’ve spent so long waiting for has finally arrived.” [1] X Research source

steps.title: “I’ve never experienced love like this before.
steps.content: “I’ve never experienced love like this before. Our romance is a new adventure, one I wasn’t prepared for and one I wouldn’t give up for anything.”

steps.title: “I didn’t know what love really was.
steps.content: “I didn’t know what love really was. I was purposeless, unmoored, and then I met you! Life has meaning now, and hope, and love.”

steps.title: “What did I do to deserve your love?
steps.content: “What did I do to deserve your love? I never felt like I was good enough for anything or anyone, but then the universe gave me you.”

steps.title: “I feel so safe when we’re together.
steps.content: “I feel so safe when we’re together. Sometimes I think if I can’t hug or kiss you, I’ll die. But when we touch, I feel calm, like everything will be OK.” [2] X Research source

steps.title: “I’ve never trusted anyone as much as I trust you.
steps.content: “I’ve never trusted anyone as much as I trust you. I can share my darkest secrets, the most secretive parts of me, and you’ll understand. You have no idea how much I value the freedom to just…be myself.”

steps.title: “Text is inadequate, but it’s all I’ve got to tell you how much I adore you.
steps.content: “Text is inadequate, but it’s all I’ve got to tell you how much I adore you. Our love is that magical sort of love that can’t be fully explained using words. But I’ll never stop trying to express my love to you anyway.”

steps.title: “I cherish the time we’ve spent together.
steps.content: “I cherish the time we’ve spent together. I never want to have another memory without you in it. The times I’ve spent with you have been the happiest of my life.”

steps.title: “You treat me better than any guy has ever treated me.
steps.content: “You treat me better than any guy has ever treated me. You know just what to say and just what to do to make me fall in love with you over and over again. I love you, and I see and appreciate everything you do for me.”

steps.title: “I’ve never felt so at home in a relationship before.
steps.content: “I’ve never felt so at home in a relationship before. Being with you just feels…natural. Like the way love’s meant to feel. A warm fireplace, a soft blanket.”

steps.title: “I could never go back to a time before I knew you.
steps.content: “I could never go back to a time before I knew you. It feels like you’ve always been a part of my life, somehow. We’ve always been meant for each other.”

steps.title: “Even the little things you do make my heart swell with love.
steps.content: “Even the little things you do make my heart swell with love. Whether you’re brushing your teeth or furrowing your brow over a book, I adore you, all the time, no matter what you’re doing.”

steps.title: “Our honeymoon phase will never end.
steps.content: “Our honeymoon phase will never end. We’ve been together for a long time now, but it still feels like the very first date. My heart beats fast whenever you look in my direction. I adore you.” [3] X Research source

steps.title: “I’m my best self when I’m with you.
steps.content: “I’m my best self when I’m with you. I feel entirely unworthy of your love, and yet I feel like a better person around you. You make me want to be kinder to everyone, more loving, more generous. Just like you.”

steps.title: “We’ve got the best of both worlds: friendship and romance.
steps.content: “We’ve got the best of both worlds: friendship and romance. You’re my confidant, my partner in crime, the person I go to for help and to share my day with. You’re also the apple of my eye, my one true love. I never knew I could find such amazing friendship and romance in the same person.”

steps.title: “You are my number-one priority.
steps.content: “You are my number-one priority. I’ll drop anything to be with you, my love, and I’ll do anything for you. Nothing comes before you.”

steps.title: “I want to know how to love you best, because you deserve the best.
steps.content: “I want to know how to love you best, because you deserve the best. Do you like to receive gifts, physical touch, or words of affirmation? Or maybe quality time, or acts of service?” [4] X Trustworthy Source Cleveland Clinic Educational website from one of the world's leading hospitals Go to source

steps.title: “Nobody else compares.
steps.content: “Nobody else compares. We laugh together nonstop, and I know you always have my back in any situation, for better or worse. You’re my travel buddy and the person I run everyday errands with. No matter the circumstances, you bring my life fun and excitement and meaning.”

steps.title: “We’re a match made in heaven.
steps.content: “We’re a match made in heaven. Romeo and Juliet weren’t more in sync than we are. The universe designed you for me and me for you, and now it’s finally brought us together.”

steps.title: “You’re in my every thought.
steps.content: “You’re in my every thought. I lose focus of my work, I trail off mid-sentence in conversations. Even the most fun moments of my day are interrupted by thoughts of you, what you’re doing, how you’re feeling, and when I’ll see you again.”

steps.title: “I value your perspective so much.
steps.content: “I value your perspective so much. Your view of the world has completely changed how I approach my day-to-day reality. I see life in so much more color than I used to.”

steps.title: “Any day you’re not with me is a bad day.
steps.content: “Any day you’re not with me is a bad day. I could be having the time of my life, but it would feel as if I’m missing a limb. You’re my lost arm, my phantom leg. Be by my side.”
